alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:51PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Baldwin County through 530 PM CDT... At 451 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Loxley, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Robertsdale, Loxley and Stapleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
